For more information, visit splitthebillny.com We have some of your favorite breakfast, brunch, and lunch items available, like our Avocado Smash Order yours now! 518-871-1780 sweetmimiscafe.com Sweet Mimi’s To-Go Thursday-Monday: 8am-2pm

Made with locally crafted sausage, crispy applewood bacon, red & yellow peppers, diced onions, and cheddar cheese in our 3 egg omelette To see our Weekly Specials and to view our full takeout menu, visit our website and give us a call whenever you are ready to order! sweetmimiscafe.com 518-871-1780

Today's flavors: Brown Cinnamon Sugar Blueberry Nutella Best paired with: ️COFFEE! . ️Cafe Weekend Hours: 9am-1pm (to-go only) ️Order online (link in bio) If sweet isn't your thing, we have our savory bacon, sausage or vegan breakfast sammies! .

items.title: Wishing all our loyal followers a heartfelt Happy …
items.content_html:
@walt_cafe

Wishing all our loyal followers a heartfelt Happy Valentine's Day!! Walt loves you . Celebrate today with our festive specialty latte, a raspberry white mocha latte made with housemade syrup, your choice of milk, topped with whipped cream and sugar sprinkles. It is truly Love in a Cup!! ️ . Today's hours: 9am-1pm (to-go only) Order online! (Link in bio) XOXOXO .

items.title: Happy Presidents’ Day y’all
items.content_html:
@walt_cafe

Happy Presidents’ Day y’all!!! Hope you’re enjoying the day off. Other good news to kick off your week. WALT CAFE WILL BE RE-OPENING FOR DINE-IN SERVICE THIS THURSDAY!!!! ***confetti pop*** . We will be opening up Thursday for dine-in service 8am - 2pm. Our new hours are: ️Thurs - Sun: 8am - 2pm available for dine-in, pickup, online ordering, delivery . See all your beautiful masked faces on Thursday .

items.title: BIG NEWS
items.content_html:
@walt_cafe

BIG NEWS! Walt and Whitman Brewing has been nominated by USA Today Readers Choice top new brewery for 2021! We are so appreciative to be a finalist alongside other breweries from all across the country. It is all thanks to our extraordinary community--our day 1 customers and familiar faces to new friends and walker-bys. We have each of you to thank. We are so excited to be representing Saratoga, our home and where so much of our inspiration comes from. Lets show up and show out, Saratoga style, please support by voting (link in bio). Also- you can vote EVERYDAY until March 16th!! Set your alarms daily to get that vote in. Lets show the country how supportive Saratoga is :)

items.title: WE GOT OPTIONS
items.content_html:
@walt_cafe

WE GOT OPTIONS. Dine in or to go. Order here or online. Grab a sandwich with sausage, bacon, or a vegetarian patty (). Mix and match on English muffins (plain, whole-wheat, gluten-free, cinnamon-raisin). So many good choices you can make today! Choice @walt_cafe for a day best enjoyed ! CAFE HOURS: **dine in** Wednesday-Sunday: 8-2pm BREWERY HOURS **to go only** Thursday-Saturday: 4-8pm Sunday: 12-5pm

items.title: Another snowy day in Saratoga
items.content_html:
@walt_cafe

Another snowy day in Saratoga! Cozy up in the Walt Cafe with a warm drink, good wifi, cool art, fresh Walt Tarts, homemade breakfast sammies, and overall great vibes. What better way to spend your Friday?! . ️Walt Tart Flavors: Nutella, Strawberry, Blueberry ️Cafe Hours: 8am-2pm ️Specialty Latte: Raspberry White Mocha ️Now Serving: Vegetarian Breakfast Sammies! ️VOTE for Whitman Brewing for USA Today's Best New Brewery (link in bio) ️TGIF!! .

items.title: It’s the weekend
items.content_html:
@walt_cafe

It’s the weekend... TREAT YOURSELF These Walt tarts are waiting and they have your name on it! . Today’s flavors: ️ Nutella ️ Cherry ️ Blueberry ️ Brown Cinnamon Sugar . WALT CAFE INFO: ️Open 8am - 2pm ️ Now available for dine-in, to-go and online ordering & delivery ️ Call us: 518-682-3602 .

items.title: Sunday morning details
items.content_html:
@walt_cafe

Sunday morning details . Join us for your morning coffee, afternoon treat (), or spend the entire day hanging out in the lounge! We encourage browsing the wall art, skimming through the books on the bookshelf, and taking in all the good vibes! ️ . ️Walt Tart Flavors: Cherry, Strawberry, Brown Cinnamon Sugar, & Nutella ️Cafe Hours: 8am-2pm! ️VOTE for Whitman Brewing @whitman_brewing (our brother brewery located downstairs) for BEST NEW BREWERY IN THE USA! (link in bio!) ️Have a splendid Sunday! . .

items.title: MONDAY NOTIFICATIONWalt and Whitman Brewing has be…
items.content_html:
@walt_cafe

MONDAY NOTIFICATIONWalt and Whitman Brewing has been nominated by USA Today Readers Choice top new brewery for 2021! We’re so honored and thankful to represent Saratoga! Show support and show up with us to VOTE Here’s how it works: ️Go to the link in our bio, click on best new brewery, scroll down to Whitman ️Click on best new brewery ️Scroll down to Whitman Brewing ️CAST THAT VOTE. . The best news is you can show support every day (and more then once if you go on different devices) and vote. . WALT CAFE: ️Wednesday-Sunday 8-2pm ️Available for dine-in, pickup, to-go and online ordering ️Call us! Our number is 518-682-3602 . Amazing PC: @craftbeerdeer

items.title: “Black History Month must be more than just a mont…
items.content_html:
@walt_cafe

“Black History Month must be more than just a month of remembrance; it should be a tribute to our history and reminder of the work that lies in the months and years ahead.” —Marty Meehan I don’t want a Black History Month. Black history is American history.” —Morgan Freeman. “I had no idea that history was being made.  I was just tired of giving up.” —Rosa Parks “We all require and want respect, man or woman, black or white. It’s our basic human right.” —Aretha Franklin “There are still many causes worth sacrificing for, so much history yet to be made.” —Michelle Obama

items.title: How I've missed grabbing drinks FOR HERE
items.content_html:
@walt_cafe

How I've missed grabbing drinks FOR HERE. Walt Cafe is open for dine-in, you can relax and enjoy all our offerings in house on this beautiful day! And better yet @Whitman_brewinig is opening for dine-in starting tomorrow at 4pm! ️Go to the link in our bio, click on best new brewery, scroll down to Whitman ️Click on best new brewery ️Scroll down to Whitman Brewing ️CAST THAT VOTE. . items.content_html:
@flatbread.social

Friday, January 29th at Flatbread Social: All Night Happy Hour AND - Teachers Drink free! $5 Cocktails, $10 Bottles of Wine, $20 Growler Fills. The deal is opened to everyone, but we’re encouraging everyone to buy a drink for a teacher. They need them. Teachers - call and claim your drinks!

items.title: It’s a blue bird day in Sunny Upstate
items.content_html:
@flatbread.social

It’s a blue bird day in Sunny Upstate. Take advantage and come hang out at the bar or grab some takeout. Either way, get outside. It’s good for you.

Amazing food specials this weekend AND all night happy hour on Friday for teachers appreciation! Grab yourself a $5 drink and pay it forward by buying one for a teacher!

items.title: We know
items.content_html:
@flatbread.social

We know. It’s f@%*! cold outside. But it’s nice and warm up in here! Come on down and have a pint.. Or two.. Or more. We don’t judge!

items.content_html:
@flatbread.social

Big Sunday coming up. Treat yourself with our SB Takeout Family meal! It’s the champion ... of Super Bowl Takeout! Eh? Get it? Ok fine. But it IS delicious and WILL make the Super Bowl more fun for you. Call us the shop or order online to reserve yours now!

items.content_html:
@flatbread.social

Special for the week: Wood-fired Clams, Shrimp, Mussels in a Spicy Tomato Broth with a couple of slices of our House Focaccia. Sh*t, we’ll wood-fire anything in these bad boys. We’re even working on a wood-fired ice cream special.

items.title: We’re sorry to announce that we will be closed for…
items.content_html:
@flatbread.social

We’re sorry to announce that we will be closed for today. We’ve been informed that an employee tested positive for COVID. We will be closed today for a deep clean and are following all necessary guidelines. Stay safe!

items.title: So - we will be closed for service this week
items.content_html:
@flatbread.social

So - we will be closed for service this week. We have too many people quarantined for potential exposure to run the restaurants smoothly. As a result, we are taking the week off. Here are some pictures of our staff that we are trying to keep safe and healthy. Hope to see you next week! @henrysttaproom

It’s Saratoga Youth Hockey Night at A percentage of all sales tonight will go to the Saratoga Youth Hockey Scholarship fund. Let’s help fund the next little Gordy Bombay’s dreams of a successful triple deke. 4-9p! Tell your friends! @acowieson82
